AIRTEC 2025

22 October 2025 – 24 October 2025

IGF Innovative Global Fairs GmbH Augsburg, Germany

Welcome to AIRTEC 2025!

AIRTEC is the International Fair on Aerospace, Future Air Mobility, Defence & Security and Defence & Space

Airtec is dedicated to solving the tremendous future challenges of aviation: These are to achieve climate neutrality quickly and to reach a new quality of life, especially in cities, by using new airborne mobility. This requires rethinking and rebuilding supply chains from scratch and using the New Space Industry, which contributes the necessary infrastructure for AI and autonomous systems.

Airtec is a central, international meeting place for suppliers and OEMs to find each other precisely and to establish new business relationships.

The main unique selling point of Airtec is that technology and innovation – like nowhere else – are always the focus here. This is how exhibitors, visitors and renowned experts sum it up.

Developers meet developers – suppliers meet buyers: AIRTEC 2025 is directed at an international audience, technical directors, senior managers, project heads, R&D managers, R&T managers, engineers, buyers from aerospace, automotive and future mobility industries to discuss practical questions, create ideas and connect.

Technical experts and lateral thinkers who are involved in challenging questions of innovative mobility will benefit from the intersectoral cross selling potential of AIRTEC 2025.

Exhibition

Demonstration of products and services and exchange with purchasers, supply chain managers, technical experts and potential investors at AIRTEC exhibition.

B2B Meetings

Get in direct contact with all AIRTEC 2022 participants at our B2B Meetings. Network with each other – match, create, collaborate. Make business and friends!

Conference

AIRTEC Conference is an excellent platform for innovations in future mobility and exchange with industry, science and politics. A hub for technology and innovations.

Impact Orbit Creative Group

Impact Orbit Creative Group is a multi-disciplinary consultancy and innovation hub focused on driving sustainable growth, digital transformation, and impact-led strategies in the space and technology sectors. We partner with organisations and startups worldwide to deliver strategic guidance, communications expertise, and frameworks for responsible innovation.
